title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 700.3 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 700.3 - Application

State Regulations

These regulations shall apply only to education
corporations, and the schools they operate, for which the board of trustees is
the charter entity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
700.3

Adopted

New

York State Register December 20, 2017 /Volume XXXIX, Issue 51, eff. 12/20/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
